title: Legends of Might and Magic
description:
Legends of Might and Magic, sometimes referred to as LoMM or simply Legends, is a first-person shooter game released by The 3DO Company in 2001 for PC. Unlike other Might and Magic games, Legends of Might and Magic is mainly a multiplayer game. When it was released, reviews likened it to a medieval Counter-Strike. Unlike Counter-Strike, however, Legends featured neutral monsters controlled by the computer.
 <a href="
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Legends_of_Might_and_Magic" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Legends_of_Might_and_Magic</a>

System Requirements

The following are minimum system requirements to play the Legends of Might 
and Magic game.  If these requirements are not met, the Legends of Might and 
Magic game may not work properly.

Computer System:       IBM PC and 100% compatibles
Operating System:      WindowsÃƒâ€šÃ‚Â® 95/98/ME/2000*
CPU:                   PentiumÃƒâ€šÃ‚Â®II 300 MHz (or equivalent) or faster recommended
Memory:                64MB RAM or higher
CD-ROM Drive:          4X CD-ROM Drive
Free Hard Disk Space:  550MB 
Sound Card:            All major DirectX 8.0 compatible sound cards
Video Card:            DirectX 8.0 compatible 16MB 3D accelerator card with 
	               Direct3DÃƒâ€šÃ‚Â® support.
Peripherals:           Keyboard and mouse

56K modem or broadband for modem/internet play, TCP/IP protocol for network 
play.

Note: If your system has a later version of DirectX, make sure that your
hardware drivers are updated and comply with that version of DirectX.

*Windows 2000 requires local administrator access.

1. Burn or mount with Daemon-tools.
2. Copy the serial number from "Serial" folder
3. Install the game
4. Install update (from "update" folder)
5. Play the game.
